scripts.//comment 1: // NODE_ENV is defined as env variable as it comes before nodemon. dotenv/config -> call config() of dotenv
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -r dotenv/config . dotenv_config_path=./config/dev.env && scserver.js
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod nodemon -r dotenv/config . dotenv_config_path=./config/prod.env && scserver.js
